General.Name: Paninvest Tbk
General.Description: PT Paninvest Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides life insurance products in Indonesia. It offers death, whole life, annuity, endowment, universal life, health, personal accident, combined endowment, and unit link insurance products. The company also provides business consulting, management, and general administration services, as well as management consulting services in the field of archives. Furhter, it engages in the mutual funds business. The company was formerly known as Pt Panin Insurance Tbk and changed its name to PT Paninvest Tbk in May 2014. PT Paninvest Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
